name: Flag Quiz
description:
Try to guess where these pixel flags are from。

Game Features:

   - No internet connection required

   - Convert flags of various countries to pixel style

   - A total of 190 national flags

   - After completing the level there will be some information about the country and the country's wikipedia page

   - There are 4 hints and skip levels, but require a different number of hints

   - Hint points can be obtained by completing levels

Notice:

   *The information about each country in this game is obtained from wikipedia. After clicking the wiki button on the end screen after completing the level, it will automatically go to the relevant page.

   *If you find any wrong information, please also let us know, we will revise it as soon as possible, thank you.

Flag Resources：

https://itch.io/c/1958601/world-pixel-flags

Contact us: HakuRan66@gmail.com
